body.name: SEBBE Tablet 10 Inch Android 13 Tablet PC 12GB RAM + 128GB ROM TF 1 TB Octa-Core 2.0 GHz, Google GMS | Bluetooth 5.0 | 5G WiFi | 6000mAh | 1280 * 800 | 5MP+8MP, Tablet with Case Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 50 mins
features: 【ULTIMATE ANDROID 13 & OCTA-CORE & 2.0 GHZ】Tablet S22 is equipped with the latest Android 13 system, which enhances privacy and security for better privacy protection and data control. The tablet is equipped with the most stable octa-core processor with a maximum frequency of 2.0GHz, which improves program running speed and mobility for web browsing, bringing a faster user experience.

【12GB RAM + 128GB ROM + TF 1TB 】Tablet 10 inch offers 12GB RAM（6GB RAM + 6GB RAM expansion） and 128GB storage, compatible with all brands of microsd/TF cards from 4GB to 1TB. The 12GB memory allows you to launch apps quickly, and the large memory allows you to enjoy millions of movies and TV shows, bringing you a more convenient and smooth user experience.

【5G/2.4G WiFi + Bluetooth 5.0】Tablet support 5G Wi-Fi, New WiFi receiving and transmitting channels improve the speed and stability of network connections. Suitable for all home networks.Connect Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth keyboards and other Bluetooth devices via Bluetooth 5.0. The tablet is GMS certified and offers full access to a wide range of Google Apps to download the apps you need.

【DISPLAY + CAMERA + FACIAL RECOGNITION】Tablets feature a 10-inch 2.5D IPS 2.5D touch screen with 1280*800 HD resolution with color reproduction and brightness.The S22 comes with dual cameras: a 5-megapixel front and an 8-megapixel rear camera. Not only can you video chat with your family, friends and colleagues through the app, but you can also unlock the screen via facial recognition.

【LIFETIME PRODUCT WARRANTY & 24 HOURS CUSTOMER SERVICE】We provide lifetime technical support and lifetime warranty. SEBBE focuses on customer service. If you have any questions, please contact us immediately, our customer service staff will reply you within 24 hours after your contact. And provide different solutions according to customers' different needs, and propose solutions that satisfy customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Latest Android 13 System S22 tablet comes with the latest version of Android 13, which has been certified by GOOGLE GMS and runs smoother than android 12 when watching movies, reading books or browsing the Internet. It can better protect your privacy and protect your safety during use. Install more apps smoothly and run stably, you just need to login to Google Play store and download apps like Netflix, YouTube, etc.

12GB RAM & 128GB ROM & 1TB Expandable S22 tablet comes with 12GB RAM + 128GB ROM with 1TB Micro SD card expansion, allowing you to keep multiple browser tabs open without sacrificing performance. With plenty of storage space to store more of your favorite content and take the hassle out of storing photos and videos, the S22 will meet all your needs for work, life, and play. 12GB of RAM lets you switch smoothly between apps. 128GB of storage lets you store all your games, photos and videos. 1TB Expand with a Micro SD card for even more storage.

Octa-Core & 2.0GHz CPU 6000mAh Battery S22 tablet is equipped with the most stable octa-core processor up to 2.0GHz to provide you with a faster operating experience. With this processor, the power consumption will be greatly reduced. Digital health and parental control This feature allows parents to easily set app lock and device usage time, which enables kids to use the tablet in a healthy and controlled way, perfect for kids or students. The S22 tablet has a large built-in 6000mAh battery that lasts for hours on a single charge, providing you with all-day battery life. The normal working time can last about 8-10 hours. Smart power management: the system further helps you plan your power supply wisely and reduce unnecessary battery drain. Dual stereo speakers to bring you an immersive surround sound entertainment experience.

2.4G+5.0G WiFi & Bluetooth 5.0 S22 tablet supports 802.11 ac/a/b/g/n high-speed dual-band Wifi, allowing you to connect to 2.4G & 5G WiFi smoothly. This dual-band WIFI tablet is well compatible with your home wireless network and gives you a more stable network. Bluetooth 5.0 increases the transmission speed from 1Mbps to 2Mbps and enhances the distance by 4 times. With a strong signal, you can combine it with other Bluetooth devices such as Bluetooth headsets, wireless keyboards and mice, and more. This tablet ensures a perfect experience and great overall performance.

Screen Projection Function This tablet comes with the function of screen casting, through WiFi to cast the content in the tablet to the smart TV, watch it on the big screen with better visual effect. Easily share your happy moments with your family. Wireless screen casting does not require complex line connection and setup, students and teachers can cast the screen directly, which is more flexible and convenient, and improves the teaching efficiency. Wireless screen casting allows you to wirelessly project the content you want to share and present on the display screen in a meeting. Without installing software, it is easy to realize business negotiation, say goodbye to the trouble of plugging and unplugging cables of the projector, and improve work efficiency.

Facial Recognition Function & Dual Camera S22 Tablet PC has a face recognition function, so you can use the tablet PC more easily. Adopting 1280* 800 HD IPS touch screen, your visual experience is more clear and delicate.S22 Tablet PC also has a thoughtful eye protection mode and humanised display mode, which can automatically adjust the screen brightness and actively filter blue light to reduce the damage to your eyes. Reading mode lets you immerse yourself in the pleasure of reading more. Dual speakers provide high-quality, realistic audio reproduction of your favourite music. 5MP front camera and 8MP rear camera allow you to video chat with family and friends anytime, anywhere, and share your unique moments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tablet for the Price
reviews.reviewText: The tablet is very nice. The screen is nice and big and the picture is really good. they are super affordable. This is a good little tablet for my young nephew who wanted something more modern. The sound level is about what I would expect as well. Very user friendly ( even for first time tablet users) It was so easy to use because its just like my phone. I would recomend this tablet to anybody. It has plenty of storage an it works as fast as i can go. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal! Fort he price, you can't go wrong. Lots of memory too.
reviews.reviewText: Overall, for the price, you can't go wrong. Great product, great storage. Keyboard is great. Has a screen film protector, a case, just great great great value.The mouse it came with did NOT work which sucks. But it was a cheap mouse anyhow, so I would have replaced it anyhow. But for the price, it doesn't matter, its a touch screen tablet that acts like a little PC, just great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good and worth it
reviews.reviewText: Packaging is really neat and nice. Im so happy that the tablet have screen protection on it already and just need to peel it plus it have extra screen protector on the side. Works good and dont die fast. mouse and keyboards are really light weight so its easy to carry, i just keep them all in the box if i need to bring them. Costumer service is on top and it have its own 1 yr warranty so no need to purchase it just email them to activate warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I almost never have to deal with annoying app crashes and a frozen tablet
reviews.reviewText: So, my tablet included a few basic items. I found two screen protectors, one of them already installed, so I didn't have to waste time applying the screen protector myself. Next, I got a slim charger and a USB charging cable, both in black. The included case has a bright blue cover and a transparent back. It fits like a glove and works to protect the tablet from scratches or minor falls. Lastly, the manual was ok but it dealt mostly with Android OS setup and settings, which I, as a long time Android user, didn't need. The only thing I could use from the manual are the support contact details maybe.I charged the tablet and it took barely ten minutes until the battery was 100% full. I guess it was already charged before shipping. I turned it on and I could connect it to my Wi-Fi 5 network to start the initial setup. After around seven minutes, I landed on the home screen with a colorful wallpaper. There a six apps and a Google apps folder. I swiped up to take a look at all apps. I counted just 27 apps, no bloat except for Hulu, Netflix and the Kids Space app. I could completely remove Hulu and Netflix but not the Kids Space app because it's a Google app.One thing I miss is that the tablet wont turn off the screen automatically when I cover it with the included case’s lid. I still have to the press the power button.According to SD Maid, a utility app that lists specs, cleans and does many more system related tasks, the tablet's CPU architecture is arm64-v8a, which makes it possible for me to install the majority of apps.The back camera provides a detailed image. The front facing camera is less detailed but I think its acceptable for Skype and other video calling apps. There's no lagging and I can zoom in and out as well.There are two speakers and the sound is loud and clear in stereo. I found out by watching a left-right speaker test video on YouTube that the speakers have to be top in order to have them in right orientation. The volume is also loud enough so I can listen from a distance.The screen is 1280x800 pixels and its multi-touch. It registers up to 5 touches at once. And there's an eye comfort mode that reduces blue light. Auto-rotation works instantly.The tablet doesn’t struggle with my productivity tasks. I could use it with Collabora office writing documents and editing spreadsheets. YouTube is responsive and I can view videos in high definition. I could do light video editing without any issues. Most important to me is social media and messaging due to my large family living all over. I can use the latest version of Facebook, Messenger, Whatsapp, Signal, TikTok, X, Line etc.As I also get many pics and vids from friends and family, I inserted a large 128 GB SD card for more storage. It took little time to format the card as portable storage.I don't have any interest in gaming and so I haven’t played any game on it. I can’t tell if it can handle any graphically demanding games.By the way, I connected my RGB keyboard without number pad to my tablet and it recognized it instantly. A notification popped up asking me if I want to turn off the virtual keyboard while the physical keyboard is plugged in. I tapped on yes. I can use many shortcuts with my RGB keyboard like Alt + Tab to switch apps.I have been using it for over a month. As far as I can remember, the tablet only froze once when I was editing a larger video. It never has done so while doing other tasks. The same goes for app crashes. It’s such a relief to know I almost never have to deal with annoying app crashes and a frozen tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weak protection - nothing fits to protect it
reviews.reviewText: I had hoped the plastic protectors and cover might work but one slip onto the floor and the screen is all cracked up. Worked pretty well for the price up until the fall. In anticipation I tried to find something that would act as better protection but noting fits correctly. The provided "screen protector" is useless and will leave you with bubbles and frustration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You can only have so many "hiccups" before you acknowledge the problem.
reviews.reviewText: The very pretty package concealed what turned out to be a pretty lousy tablet, even at the price.Setting up the tablet and transferring my data from my phone it took three tries, but, hey, I thought, nothing's perfect. Then I noticed that I only actually had 1.2 GB of RAM available of the advertised GB, even when only system processes were running. That's ridiculous, and it actually forced me to decide which app I really wanted to have open. Then I noticed that the touch screen tended to not be very responsive. Typing became an absolute pain in the rear, but using speech to text is just as bad, because it usually takes three or four tries before it properly initializes.The only game I really play is Marvel SNAP, which has nice vector art comic book graphics...except on this tablet, where even the text shows up with jaggies. Almost every app causes the tablet to stutter and hang about every 5 minutes, which gets annoying when you're actually trying to accomplish anything.Several key apps, such as Gmail, G-board, and Messages come with bizarre mandatory deviations from what I'm used to on my Pixel. Some setting options, such as preventing the home screen from rotating when auto-rotate is on for apps, are simply missing.Most alarmingly, as long as the screen is on, the battery slowly and constantly drains, even when it's plugged in to charge. Yes, it drains more slowly when it's plugged in then when it's not, but I'm really not impressed with the battery life and I can't imagine how somebody managed to keep this from dying for 10 days.It's ridiculous that the mouse included requires a USBC to USBA adapter because the manufacturers didn't think to include the proper port for the mouse chosen for inclusion. Using a dongle on a slim tablet is already going to be a pain, but now you have to use an adapter and a USBA dongle thanks to poor planning. The case is adequate, though it leaves a little something to be desired when it comes to folding it into a stand, but the biggest oversight is that there's no storage for the keyboard. Really, it seems like somebody just picked a bunch of cheap products tossed together and sell as this great deal that I am returning on Monday.Oh, and as for the excellent customer service people keep mentioning... If you really read through the five stars use, you'll notice that a lot of them mentioned being compensated in exchange for changing their review to five stars. Trying to contact the company in Amazon's app just leads you to Amazon's customer service, please try to instruct you to contact the company through the app and finally realize the problem. I contacted them via email and received no response, which makes sense in light of the revelation that this company has virtually zero presents on the internet. They do not have a website, there's no proof that they exist in any form other than some guy in a garage somewhere, and it seems silly to expect a company that doesn't even have a website to adequately take care of customer service and warranty needs.Honestly, the only good thing about this dumpster fire is that nobody reasonable is going to charge me a restocking fee for returning a crap tablet and buying something better.
